白昼 黑夜: 却说不出为什么会思念
bái zhòu hēi yè: què shuō bù chū wéi shí me huì sī niàn
White night: Can't say why I'm missing it

bái zhòu hēi yè: xià rì   dōng yè
White night: Summer day, winter night

bái zhòu hēi yè: dì qiú liǎng duān dí wú jiě
White night: No solution at either end of the earth

bái zhòu hēi yè: děng zhù   lái diàn
White night: Waiting for a call

bái zhòu hēi yè: què děng bù dào kě wàng dí chù diàn

白昼 黑夜: 说好的那天 何时能再见
bái zhòu hēi yè: shuō hǎo dí nà tiān   hé shí néng zài jiàn
White night: On the agreed day, can we see each other again?

白晝 黑夜: 飄著櫻花雪 多希望有人陪
白昼 黑夜: 飘着樱花雪 多希望有人陪
bái zhòu hēi yè: piāo zhuó yīng huā xuě   duō xī wàng yǒu rén péi

bái zhòu hēi yè: huái niàn dí cóng qián   nǐ shì fǒu liú liàn
White night: Missing the past, are you nostalgic?

bái zhòu hēi yè: jiǎn xùn zài kàn yī biàn
White night: Look at the news again

bái zhòu hēi yè: kàn zhuó nǐ shí miǎo qián gēng xīn dí instagram
White night: Looking at the Instagram you put up 10 seconds ago

白晝 黑夜: 彷彿能看見我熟悉的笑臉從沒改變
白昼 黑夜: 仿佛能看见我熟悉的笑脸从没改变
bái zhòu hēi yè: fǎng fó néng kàn jiàn wǒ shú xī dí xiào liǎn cóng méi gǎi biàn
White night: It seems as if my familiar smile hasn't changed

白昼 黑夜: 恨不能让你心动让你捕捉每个瞬间
bái zhòu hēi yè: hèn bù néng ràng nǐ xīn dòng ràng nǐ bǔ zhuō měi gè shùn jiān
White night: Hate can't stop your heart from capturing every moment

bái zhòu hēi yè: ràng wǒ gū dān dí shì jiè
White night: Let me be alone in the world
